entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:50 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
